name: ishowoff
description: Show off your coding sessions on Github live. Its like Discord RPC, but for Github

ishowoff.github.actionsRepo.markdownDescription: Please fork [parapsychic/ishowoff](https://github.com/parapsychic/ishowoff) to your account and enter the name of the fork. If you left it on default, it should be ishowoff.

ishowoff.github.token.markdownDescription: Generate a Personal Access Token from Github. [See how](https://docs.github.com/en/authentication/keeping-your-account-and-data-secure/managing-your-personal-access-tokens). Expiration date is recommended. Please note that I won't be responsible for keys being stolen, please keep it secure.

ishowoff.formatting.theme.markdownDescription: Choose between themes. dark/light by default. You can set each fonts and colors individually. [See how](https://github.com/parapsychic/ishowoff).
